card.enc: Your credit card information is encrypted
card.start: Your subscription begins once you click "Start Subscription" below. We perform the first charge after 2 weeks since subscription starts. If you cancel your subscription in your first month we will refund the full amount. If you don't cancel by day 30, your card will be charged according to your plan. You can cancel your subscription at any time just by sending us an email at info@dentaltap.com
card.edit: You already subscribed for DentalTap and added a payment method. If you want to replace it, enter new credit card data and click on the "Update Details" button. Send us an email to info@dentaltap.com if you would like to stop your subscription.

sms_length.title: SMS length
sms_length.descr: We recomend you to keep your notifications short as the SMS length is 160 characters. If your message more than 160 characters it will be splitted into chunks and you will have extra charge.

register.title: Get started for free
register.descr: We will help you save time on everyday tasks and reduce patients no-shows.
register.descr2: We just need some of your details to finish the registration. We will use your contact data for support purposes.

email.descr: We will send you a confirmation message

1.title: Streamline workflow
1.descr: We will help you with all daily tasks like scheduling, treatment planning, billing and making reports.

2.title: Get more patients
2.descr: We will help you get more patients with appointment booking portal and treatments presentations.

3.title: Import your data
3.descr: We will import all the data from current software absolutely for free or help you digitize medical records.

4.title: Global community
4.descr: Join us and be a part of our dental community in more than 20 countries in Europe, Asia, Latin America.

content.2: Here you can schedule your patients, add your working hours, use tasks for follow-on visits, and customize your calendar. Check out our tutorial to learn more!
content.3: Or talk to us, we are here for you! 🙌 💻 📲

content.2: Here you can add new records, search for patients and sort your records. Freemium version already included 100 free patients records.
content.3: Its so easy to get started here right now! 👩‍💻 👨‍💻

content.1: How do you feel about the patient profile? 👩‍🔬
content.2: We divided it into two sections, office tasks on the left, practice tasks on the right. Let's get started by adding new procedures and diagnoses!
content.3: To learn more, check that video tutorial below 👇👇

1.title: Create fast
1.text: Click on the "Create" button in the top menu to create a patient card. It’s enough to fill in the name and phone fields to create a new patient.

2.title: Patient Search
2.text: Use the search field on the right to find a patient by name or phone number. Just enter the first 3 letters or 3 digits for the phone number.

3.title: Basic Filters
3.text: Convenient search by category - primary, debtors and archived patients. The options are located in the top menu of the page.

1.title: Profile
1.text: All basic information about the patient is stored here, you can add arbitrary fields - phone number, date, address or text.

2.title: Tasks
2.text: Use this section to store reminders, such as repeat visits or calls. These reminders are displayed on the calendar.

3.title: Документы
3.text: Fast documents creation - treatment consent agreements, personal data agreements etc. You must add your own document templates before you begin.

4.title: Notes
4.text: This section is used for internal notes about the patient, for example, here you can write a brief result of a telephone conversation with the patient.

5.title: Treatments
5.text: All visits are stored under the visits tab. To suggest one or more treatment plans, click on the new plan button. All created plans will be displayed under the "Select plan " tab.

6.title: History
6.text: Notes for visits - history, complaints, research results, etc. Set up a convenient format for templates for your clinic. These notes will be displayed in a printed patient card.

7.title: Billing
7.text: Patient summary - the amount of bills, paid bills and debts. Quickly create a new account and a list of completed procedures for which an account has not yet been created.

8.title: Files
8.text: Store any patient files - X-ray, 3D images, acts of completed work, and any other files of arbitrary size.

booking.welcome: Hi! Welcome to my schedule. Please follow the instructions below to make your dental appointment.
booking.no_slot: Can't find timeslot that fits you? Please call us {{phone}} or send us an email to {{email}}

online.explain: Provide this link to your patients, so they will be able to schedule their appointments online.

confirmed.title: Appointment confirmed
confirmed.1: Thank you, your appointment at {{name}} was scheduled. We might call you back soon to confirm date and time of your visit.

2.1: We are looking forward to see you on

confirmed.3: If you can't attend for any reason or would like to reschedule please call now {{phone}}
